main.name: Thomas Neter
main.education: Systems Design Engineering from the University of Waterloo
main.bio: In my free time I enjoy playing soccer, running, hiking, bouldering; reading fantasy (Tolkien, Malazan) or horror; and playing video games, some favorites being Uncharted, Skyrim, Smash Bros, Fifa, and Rocket League. I also love travelling, some of my favorite places I've visited include Portugal, Spain, Italy, Finland, and Japan.

education.title: Systems Design Engineering (B.A.Sc.)
description: Studied courses reflecting a wide range of industries such as comp-sci, product design, and mechanical engineering. It prepares the student for leadership in a complex technological society that requires interdisciplinary thinking capability to meet future needs for complex, balanced decision-making.
